content.question: Policymakers concerned about fostering long-run growth in an economy that is currently in a recession would most likely recommend which of the following combinations of monetary and fiscal policy actions?

choices.label:
Monetary Policy
 Fiscal Policy

Increase administered interest rates
 Reduce taxes

Monetary Policy
 Fiscal Policy

Increase administered interest rates
 Raise taxes

Monetary Policy
 Fiscal Policy

No change
 Raise taxes

Monetary Policy
 Fiscal Policy

Decrease administered interest rates
 Reduce spending

Monetary Policy
 Fiscal Policy

Decrease administered interest rates
 No change

content.answer:
Monetary Policy
 Fiscal Policy

Decrease administered interest rates
 No change
